My account Sign out SOLUTIONS Unified-IAM Cloud Zero Trust PRODUCTS DBSAFER DB DBSAFER AM DBSAFER OS DBSAFER IM DATACRYPTO RECRUIT Employee Welfare Recruitment How to Apply SUPPORT Sales Inquiry Tech Inquiry INFRASTRUCTURE SERVER/NETWORK SYSTEM ACCE SS CONTROL ____ DBSAFER AM performs security activities such as managing access and permissions of users and auditing their task history. It can also be linked with DBSAFER DB to enhance management against all server access attempts. NO.1 #1 in Korean market share for DBMS/System integrated access management 100% Perfectly complies with Korean regulations DBSAFER AM performs security activities such as managing access and permissions of users and auditing their task history. It can also be linked with DBSAFER DB to enhance management against all server access attempts. #1 in Korean market share for Perfectly complies with Korean regulations Recommends integrated access management to enhance corporate security Merge the system access management solution and the DB access management solution for more powerful security features and optimized work environment Larger protection coverage __ By merging a system access management solution and a DB access management solution, they can monitor and control each other's areas beyond their own. Quick response to issues through better visibility __ DBSAFER AM allows administrators to swiftly check activities, abnormalities, and risks of all users in DB and systems via a single UI and respond at once. Simplified internal security management __ DBSAFER AM prevents internal security threats by integrating the policy management process and the location of audit log collection to minimize the repetition in the administrators' tasks so that they can apply security policies consistently. Elevated user convenience __ DBSAFER AM guarantees high work convenience and resource availability by establishing a system through which users can connect by authenticating once and allowing the users to freely select a connection point in the DB list. Recommends integrated access management to enhance corporate security Merge the system access management solution and the DB access management solution for more powerful security features and optimized work environment By merging a system access management solution and a DB access management solution, they can monitor and control each other's areas beyond their own. DBSAFER AM allows administrators to swiftly check activities, abnormalities, and risks of all users in DB and systems via a single UI and respond at once. DBSAFER AM prevents internal security threats by integrating the policy management process and the location of audit log collection to minimize the repetition in the administrators' tasks so that they can apply security policies consistently. DBSAFER AM guarantees high work convenience and resource availability by establishing a system through which users can connect by authenticating once and allowing the users to freely select a connection point in the DB list. Key Features Manages access and permissions for each account DBSAFER AM supports access management for all OS in operation such as AIX, HP-UX, Linux, Solaris, and Windows. Additionally, it allows the user to monitor and manage Windows Unix/Linux terminals and file transfer services. Monitors all connectible routes DBSAFER AM is the only access management solution in Korea that uses Server Agent to monitor all routes leading to the database, including gateway bypassers and routes that directly connects to consoles in the data center. Supports diverse user access environments Both the C/S (PC NAT) method where the program or environment which made the connection is maintained and the method of a user accessing via the web are supported. Additionally, the automatic login feature upholds both user convenience and security levels. Monitors and logs remote access in real-time For tasks carried out by connecting to Windows Terminal Service (RDP), the product allows administrators to monitor user screens in real-time and re-enact cases using screenshots. It also provides meta-search for collected audit logs. Manages script files DBSAFER AM can analyze the content of script files executed by users and apply security measures such as blocking the execution if the script contains blacklisted commands. Supports 2-factor authentication Security against system accesses can be enhanced using 2-factor authentication with external means such as smart cards call authentication, and OTP. Many of our clients are using this service. Supports Windows, Linux (GUI), and macOS DBSAFER DB provides identical features using PC Assist, and it is the only one in the industry that supports macOS. DBSAFER AM supports access management for all OS in operation such as AIX, HP-UX, Linux, Solaris, and Windows. Additionally, it allows the user to monitor and manage Windows Unix/Linux terminals and file transfer services. DBSAFER AM is the only access management solution in Korea that uses Server Agent to monitor all routes leading to the database, including gateway bypassers and routes that directly connects to consoles in the data center. For tasks carried out by connecting to Windows Terminal Service (RDP), the product allows administrators to monitor user screens in real-time and re-enact cases using screenshots. It also provides meta-search for collected audit logs. DBSAFER AM can analyze the content of script files executed by users and apply security measures such as blocking the execution if the script contains blacklisted commands. Security against system accesses can be enhanced using 2-factor authentication with external means such as smart cards call authentication, and OTP. Many of our clients are using this service. DBSAFER DB provides identical features using PC Assist, and it is the only one in the industry that supports macOS. INFRASTRUCTURE SERVER/NETWORK SYSTEM ACCESS CONTROL ____ DBSAFER AM performs security activities such as managing access and permissions of users and auditing their task history. It can also be linked with DBSAFER DB to enhance management against all server access attempts. NO.1 #1 in Korean market share for DBMS/System integrated access management 100% Perfectly complies with Korean regulations DBSAFER AM performs security activities such as managing access and permissions of users and auditing their task history. It can also be linked with DBSAFER DB to enhance management against all server access attempts. #1 in Korean market share for DBMS/System integrated access management Perfectly complies with Korean regulations Configuration Overview Gateway(Proxy) Configuration DBSAFER AM is based on a gateway (proxy) configuration that controls all inflow/outflow network data. It supports both the method of using PC Assist and the method of using the web. DBSAFER DB maximizes security by using Server Agent to control indirect accesses that do not pass through gateways. DBSAFER AM is based on a gateway (proxy) configuration that controls all inflow/outflow network data. It supports both the method of using PC Assist and the method of using the web. DBSAFER DB maximizes security by using Server Agent to control indirect accesses that do not pass through gateways. Secure Your Business with PNPSECURE Kicking off with the development of the first database access management solution in Korea, PNPSECURE is leading the next-generation digital security market with access management, account management, access history management, encryption, and face recognition OUR MISSION C reate a security solution that every security officer in the world wants to use _____ In the face of rapidly changing IT environments and all the threats of digital security incidents, we have founded PNPSECURE to create a security solution that every security officer in the world wants to use. Since starting business in 2003 as the first DB access management service company in Korea, we have always considered our role in developing the best digital security solutions and realizing the public interest through them. Finally we have confirmed that our role is to create standards for digital security based on expertise and technology. Over 20 years of experience and technology, PNPSECURE has expanded its business area, keeping pace with evovlving security trends, and is now becoming one of top global IT security companies beyond Korea. PNPSECURE will keep focusing on developing and providing products that perfectly meet clients' needs. We believe all companies can build a secure infrastructure environment which is comfortable and convenient to manage, with us.
